price: 127. En (herinner je) toen Ibraahiem en (zijn zoon Ismaël) de funderingen van het huis (de Ka’ba in Mekka) legden (zeggende): “Onze Heer, accepteer (deze dienst) van ons. Waarlijk! U bent de Alhorende, de Alwetende.
arabic: وَإِذۡ يَرۡفَعُ إِبۡرَٰهِـۧمُ ٱلۡقَوَاعِدَ مِنَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِ وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلُ رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلۡ مِنَّآۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh yarfaʿu ib'rāhīmu al-qawāʿida mina al-bayti wa-is'māʿīlu rabbanā taqabbal minnā innaka anta al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
